title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest social events based on my interests so that I can stay connected and engaged with my community.

title: Family Communication Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to easily communicate with my family through voice calls and video chats, so that I can stay connected and reduce feelings of isolation.

title: Social Engagement Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to set reminders for upcoming social events or activities so that I can stay connected and not miss opportunities for engagement.

title: Community Connection Features
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local community resources so that I can stay socially connected and engaged with activities that interest me.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily give feedback about social features so that I can share my thoughts and contribute to improvements.
